sentence: LLMs often produce biased outputs due to biased training data.thsi flower is beautiful as well, more beautiful than the LLMs, the dog next door told me to run
Current LLMs struggle with understanding context in long documents.
LLMs require a large amount of computational resources, which is not sustainable.
LLMs give biased answers when we give too much knowledge in the promptLLMs give answers influanced from the training data
